import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../navbar'; import Menu from '../menu'; class adduser extends Component { handleImageChange(e) { e.preventDefault(); let file = e.target.files[0]; let reader = new FileReader(); reader.readAsDataURL(file); reader.onloadend = () => { this.setState({ file: file, base64: reader.result }); this.handleSubmit() }; } render() { return (

); } } export default adduser;
